root: ^As the twisted pirate-demon falls, a familiar clattering of whispers fills the damp cavern. After a moment, the voices coalesce into a single, booming voice once more.
^"So this is where the maggot was hiding. Well done [[class]], you've done us a grand favor."
^talent:watched;I need to get to the Black Citadel
^!talent:watched;I need to get to the Black Citadel

c-0: ^"A greedy nuisance, stealing things that belong to us..." the voices break apart once more. "To us! Us! Belong to us!"
^Finally, the words settle down into a discernible pattern again. "Both our worlds are better off without their cursed existence if that eases your conscience, [[class]]."

bargain: ^"Ah yes - our part of our little bargain. You have not disappointed, [[class]]. And perhaps... you will surprise us yet."
^"Ah yes - our part of our little bargain.
^Suddenly a flash of light fills the cavern. As your eyes readjust, you see a trail of lights leading down the narrow trenches of the underground ruins.
^"Go now, with our Blessing, Lumian." The Voices whisper, once more returning to the chaotic cacophony before disappearing into the darkness of The Deep.
